content.question: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is defined by the power series <math alttext="f of x equals, the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator n plus 3, and denominator n factorial, end fraction, times x to the n power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> for all <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. If <math alttext="g of x, equals, the integral from, 0 to x, of, t squared, times f of, open parenthesis, 3 t, close parenthesis, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="g of 1, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator n factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator n plus 3, and denominator n factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator 3 to the n power, and denominator n factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator 3 to the n power, times, open parenthesis, n plus 3, close parenthesis, and denominator open parenthesis, n plus 1, close parenthesis, factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator 3 to the n power, and denominator n factorial, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
